# HEAPSIZE
[!INCLUDE[vs2017banner](../../assembler/inline/includes/vs2017banner.md)]

[\/HEAP](../../build/reference/heap-set-heap-size.md) 링커 옵션과 같은 기능을 노출합니다.  
  
```  
/HEAP:reserve[,commit]  
```
